```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
setwd("~/ref/allen_brain/mouse/aging/")

# load in data downloaded from https://cellxgene.cziscience.com/collections/31937775-0602-4e52-a799-b6acdd2bac2e
allen <-
  readRDS("~/ref/allen_brain/mouse/aging/be390e1d-1412-454f-aa8f-925ca3beacff.rds")
allen$ID <-
  gsub("10X_MsBrainAgingSpatial", "", allen$donor_id)

# make a preliminary UMAP with cell type annotations
DimPlot(allen,
        group.by = c("ID","age","cell_type"),
        shuffle = T)
ggsave("./prelim_umaps.jpeg",
       width = 15,
       height = 4)

# make some QC violin plots
allen$nFeatures_RNA <- allen$nFeaturess_RNA
VlnPlot(allen,
        features = c("nCounts_RNA", "nFeatures_RNA"),
        group.by = "ID",
        alpha = 0.1)
ggsave("./prelim_vlnplot.jpeg",
       width = 8,
       height = 4)

# make a table of cell quantities
allen$age_donor <-
  paste0(allen$age, "_", allen$ID)
tbl <-
  table(allen$age_donor, allen$cell_type) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  filter(Freq != 0) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = Var1,
              values_from = Freq) %>%
  as.data.frame()
colnames(tbl) <-
  c("cell_type", colnames(tbl)[2:5])

# save object
saveRDS(allen,
        "~/ref/allen_brain/mouse/aging/allen_brain_mouse_aging_snrna.rds")
```
